bug.author: nibbasbenibbing
bug.description:
Says update available: 0.0.1 but update button doesn't work. Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Go to checkpoints Click on update Scroll down to Dreampower update available Click on update See Update failed There was a problem trying to download the update, please verify that you are connected to the Internet. If the problem persists try to configure or temporarily disable your Firewall/Antivirus/VPN.
I don't have any firewalls or antivirus up and am obviously connected to the internet. Can't use without updating.

comments.comment:
That's an issue with DreamTime: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dreamnettech/dreamtime>https://github.com/dreamnettech/dreamtime</denchmark-link>
not related to DreamPower
